name: 8th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences and Humanities
content: Having successfully launched the seventh edition of the ICARSH conference, we are happy to announce that the 8th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences and Humanities will take place in April 2024 in Madrid, Spain. Taking place on April 26-28, 2024, ICARSH will continue the tradition of delighting its attendees with tailored presentations, relevant discussions, lively networking, and limitless learning opportunities. Take note of the important deadlines – whether you’re joining as a virtual, poster, oral presenter or attendee. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to get published in indexed journals and share your findings with our extensive network of international academics. We invite you to join the event, take in the knowledge, participate in discussions, and contribute to the continuous development of the fields of social sciences and humanities. See you at ICARSH!
